About

My name is Kurt Barlow, a seasoned professional in the realm of visual communication. Armed with a degree in audiovisual communication and a master's in motion graphics and 3D, I have dedicated my career to the seamless fusion of art and technology.

Currently, I serve as a Digital Designer, crafting immersive and compelling digital experiences. It's not just a job for me; it's a passion that propels me to explore the ever-evolving landscape of design and development. In tandem with my ongoing pursuit of knowledge, I am currently enrolled in a master's program specializing in front-end development and JavaScript, expanding my skill set to meet the demands of the dynamic digital age.

My moniker, 'Kurt Barlow,' pays homage to the literary genius of Stephen King, a source of profound inspiration in my creative journey. King's work has not only shaped my artistic sensibilities but also fueled my fascination with storytelling, horror, and the boundless possibilities of the human imagination.

INSPIRED BY

The principal works that have molded my personality, influenced my worldview, and fostered a deep interest in the audiovisual realm.
